class.name: OScriptNodeDelay
class.brief_description: Yields the execution of the orchestration based on the specified delay.
class.description: The [OScriptNodeDelay] node yields the execution of the control flow based on the specified [param duration] number of seconds. Internally, the node creates a scene-based [Timer] with the specified [param duration], and yields execution. When the [Timer] raises the [code]timeout[/code] signal, the Orchestration resumes where it left off, continuing the execution flow.
